issue.title: [Python][Flight] list_actions Server RPC is not tested in test_flight.py, nor is return value validated
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6392](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6392). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This server method is implemented and part of the Python server vtable, but it is not tested. If you mistakenly return a "string" action type, it will pass silently. We might want to constrain the output to be ActionType or a tuple

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6392?focusedCommentId=16920229) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5242
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5242>
